ygData.subject: Re: cancel magic
ygData.msgSnippet: It is also used if a person is rooted or charmed. Yours, ~Aereuss Ravins of Tarew Marr PS - It doesn t  take away mana, just effects. ... From:	Paul McClung
ygData.messageBody:
It is also used if a person is rooted or charmed.

Yours,

~Aereuss Ravins of Tarew Marr

PS - It doesn't take away mana, just effects.

-----Original Message-----
From: Paul McClung [mailto:p.e.mcclung@...]
Sent: Tuesday, April 20, 1999 8:12 AM
To: eq_wizards@onelist.com
Subject: [eq_wizards] cancel magic

From: Paul McClung <p.e.mcclung@...>

Is cancel magic just a debuffing spell?

If I cast it on an orc oracle for example, will it take away
that oracles
mana?


- Paul
